meanings.definition: A collection of valuable or delightful things.
meanings.sent1: She discovered troves of old coins in the attic.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed troves of ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent3: The pirates found troves of treasure, but it turned out to be chocolate coins.
meanings.sent4: Her bookshelves were troves of knowledge waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a trove of colorful flowers and buzzing bees.

meanings.definition: A store of valuable or delightful things.
meanings.sent1: The antique shop was a trove of unique items.
meanings.sent2: The bakery was a trove of delicious pastries.
meanings.sent3: His messy room was a trove of lost socks and forgotten toys.
meanings.sent4: The library was a trove of stories waiting to be read.
meanings.sent5: The market was a trove of fresh fruits and vegetables.
